Module kivakit.metrics.core
Package com.telenav.kivakit.metrics.core

Class BaseMetric<T>

java.lang.Object
com.telenav.kivakit.metrics.core.BaseMetric<T>
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.telenav.kivakit.core.time.CreatedAt, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.naming.Named, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.numeric.DoubleQuantizable, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.numeric.Quantizable, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.numeric.QuantumComparable<Metric<T>>, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.string.Stringable, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.string.StringSource, Metric<T>
Direct Known Subclasses:
AggregateQuantumMetric, DoubleMetric, QuantumMetric
public abstract class BaseMetric<T> extends Object implements Metric<T>
Base class for metrics. All metrics have a createdAt() time, which is the time at which the metric started collecting data.
Author:
jonathanl (shibo)
